welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Risaralda, Colombia! Known for its stunning natural beauty and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santaguida Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Santaguida Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
